Class JohnsonFilter

java.lang.Object
  za.ac.salt.pipt.common.Grid

All Implemented Interfaces:
SpectrumOperator
public class JohnsonFilter
extends Filter
implements SpectrumOperator

This class implements the Johnson UBVRI filters.

Constructor Detail

JohnsonFilter

public JohnsonFilter(java.lang.String band)
Constructs the filter for the given band ("U", "B", "V", "R" or "I") by resampling the respective wavelengths and throughputs.

Parameters:
band - the band
Throws:
InvalidValueException - if the given filter band is unknown
